## üöÄ Quick Start (3 Steps)

### Step 1: Read Quick Reference (2 min)
```
Open: .github/COPILOT_QUICK_REFERENCE.md
Skim: Keyboard shortcuts, prompts, agents
```

### Step 2: Verify Installation (5 min)
```
1. Install: GitHub Copilot extensions (if not already done)
2. Sign In: With GitHub account
3. Open: Copilot Chat (Ctrl+Shift+I)
4. Verify: Chat window appears
```

### Step 3: Start Using (Immediate)
```
1. Copy: A prompt from COPILOT_QUICK_REFERENCE.md
2. Paste: Into Copilot Chat
3. Modify: For your specific code
4. Iterate: Ask follow-up questions
```
